fields.description:
Unable to use FONT in XML tag to set font color or size...

Below doesn't work on Android emulator.

<Alloy>
	<Window class="container" onOpen="f1" onPostlayout="f2" layout="vertical" >
		<Label id="label" font="{fontSize:'40'}" >Hello, World</Label>
	</Window>
</Alloy>
fields.summary: Unable to set font properties directly from the XML tag, instead of the TSS file
fields.environment:
Android emulator, SDK version 23
Appc Studio 4.8.1.201612050850

comments.body: [~isener], the TSS is the appropriate place to set the font properties. It's not supported in markup.
